HUGE Fantasy & Sci-Fi News! From Terry Brooks announcing his retirement to Dungeon Crawler Carl hitting the NYT Bestseller list. This episode is packed with major updates. We’ve got cover reveals, trailers, and even George R.R. Martin opening a bar. Plus, the new Lord of the Rings box set & Shire LEGO set are here, and we finally have a release date for Frieren Season 2! Let’s dive in!
